name: Make A Name Player Demo | Controller Needed
name_original: Make A Name Player Demo | Controller Needed
description:
This is a game where you can play story mode or play pvp online against your friends or if you want you could play mini games like death run, hide and seek and more!

Controls:

A or X to jump B or O to crouch X or Square to reload click left analog stick to run move left analog stick to move left trigger to aim and right trigger to shoot down dpad to use medkit and triangle to swap weapons
